original_body_lines: A decision whether or not to continue with the increased fuel quota for the festive season will be taken today, the Power and Energy Ministry said.
It said steps had been taken to increase the fuel quota, with effect from midnight on April 4.

Accordingly, the fuel quota for passenger three-wheelers (special) has been increased from 10-15L, three-wheelers (general) from 5-8L, motorcycles from 4L to 7L, buses from 40L to 60L, cars from 20L to 30L, land vehicles from 15L to 25L, lorries from 50L to 75L, quadricyles from 4L to 6L, special purpose vehicles from 20L to 30L, and vans from 20L to 30L. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
